title: Spirits
body:
The Spiritual Triplicity:

  • Iþubenĩn
  • Edrenĩn
  • Urünĩn
preface: The Spirits, archaicly known as the Triplicity, are the three Spirits, or species of microorganisms. They have been worshipped by various races and cultures over time, often in different ways,

title: Spirits
body:
The Spiritual Triplicity:

  • Illubleine
  • Edrenine
  • Urunine

title: Spirits
body:
The Spiritual Triplicity:

  • Iþubenĩn
  • Edrenĩn
  • Urünĩn


Use of the Spirits

Fenraye's Eku-Chain and language made the Spirits use limited, but also helped to make Spells safer, as the scope for error was vastly reduced. Raw use of the Spirits can be dangerous and it is harder to control.
preface: The Spirits, archaicly known as the Triplicity, are the three Spirits, or species of microorganisms. They have been worshipped by various races and cultures over time, often in different ways,

The Spiritual Triplicity:

  • Urünĩn

title: Spirits
body:
The Spiritual Triplicity:

  • Iþubenĩn
  • Edrenĩn
  • Urünĩn


Use of the Spirits

Fenraye's Eku-Chain and language made the Spirits use limited, but also helped to make Spells safer, as the scope for error was vastly reduced. Raw use of the Spirits can be dangerous and it is harder to control.

Some people are more naturally capable with certain Spirits.

Light is most powerful above ground, dark underground and essence in the sky (junka needs to travel skywards to become one with the spirits in book 4)
preface: The Spirits, archaicly known as the Triplicity, are the three Spirits, or species of microorganisms. They have been worshipped by various races and cultures over time, often in different ways,

title: Spirits
body:
The Spiritual Triplicity:

  • Iþubenĩn
  • Edrenĩn
  • Urünĩn


Use of the Spirits

Fenraye's Eku-Chain and language made the Spirits use limited, but also helped to make Spells safer, as the scope for error was vastly reduced. Raw use of the Spirits can be dangerous and it is harder to control.

Some people are more naturally capable with certain Spirits.

Light is most powerful above ground, dark underground and essence in the sky (junka needs to travel skywards to become one with the spirits in book 4)

Some spells can only be conjured with two or more people

title: Spirits
body:
The Spiritual Triplicity:

  • Iþubenĩn: Space & Time
  • Edrenĩn: Physical Reality
  • Urünĩn: Conciousness


Use of the Spirits

Fenraye's Eku-Chain and language made the Spirits use limited, but also helped to make Spells safer, as the scope for error was vastly reduced. Raw use of the Spirits can be dangerous and it is harder to control.

Some people are more naturally capable with certain Spirits.

Light is most powerful above ground, dark underground and essence in the sky (junka needs to travel skywards to become one with the spirits in book 4)

Some spells can only be conjured with two or more people

title: Spirits
body:
The Spiritual Triplicity:

  • Iþubenĩn: Space & Time
  • Edrenĩn: Physical Reality
  • Urünĩn: Conciousness


Use of the Spirits

Fenraye's Eku-Chain and language made the Spirits use limited, but also helped to make Spells safer, as the scope for error was vastly reduced. Raw use of the Spirits can be dangerous and it is harder to control.

Some people are more naturally capable with certain Spirits.

Light is most powerful above ground, dark underground and essence in the sky (junka needs to travel skywards to become one with the spirits in book 4)

Some spells can only be conjured with two or more people.

Fenraye taught fire for heat, wind for moving, and electricity for force (tree felling, rock breaking)
preface: The Spirits, archaicly known as the Triplicity, are the three Spirits, or species of microorganisms. They have been worshipped by various races and cultures over time, often in different ways,

title: Spirits
body:
The Spiritual Triplicity:

  • Iþubenĩn: Space & Time
  • Edrenĩn: Physical Reality
  • Urünĩn: Conciousness


Use of the Spirits

Fenraye's Eku-Chain and language made the Spirits use limited, but also helped to make Spells safer, as the scope for error was vastly reduced. Raw use of the Spirits can be dangerous and it is harder to control.

Some people are more naturally capable with certain Spirits.

Light is most powerful above ground, dark underground and essence in the sky (junka needs to travel skywards to become one with the spirits in book 4)

Some spells can only be conjured with two or more people.

Fenraye taught fire for heat, wind for moving, and electricity for force (tree felling, rock breaking). All of Fenrate's major spells require Tebnuq, limiting the time and place that Spells can be used by Fenraye's Limits
preface: The Spirits, archaicly known as the Triplicity, are the three Spirits, or species of microorganisms. They have been worshipped by various races and cultures over time, often in different ways,

title: Spirits
body:
The Spiritual Triplicity:

  • Iþubenaen: Existential Reality/Meta
  • Edrenaen: Physical Reality/Material
  • Urünaen: Mental Reality/Mental
preface: The Spirits, archaicly known as the Triplicity, are three subspecies of of a species of sentient colonial single-celled microorganism. They have been worshipped by various races and cultures over time due to the symbiotic relationship they have with the various humanoid species.

title: Spirits
body:
The Spiritual Triplicity

  • Iþubenaen: Existential Reality/Meta
  • Edrenaen: Physical Reality/Material
  • Urünaen: Mental Reality/Mental
preface: The Spirits, archaicly known as the Triplicity, are three subspecies of of a species of sentient colonial single-celled microorganism. They have been worshipped by various races and cultures over time due to the symbiotic relationship they have with the various humanoid species.

title: Spirits
body:
The Spiritual Triplicity

  • Iþubenaen: Existential Reality/Meta
  • Edrenaen: Physical Reality/Material
  • Urünaen: Mental Reality/Mental

Mythology

The Spirits are credited for the creation of the planet, Ïrü (Heru), and for the creation of the various humanoid species of the planet. This mythology has largely been forgotten, however, by the Ћuman populations, and what fragments are truth remain are distorted by cultural adaptations and subjective interpretations.
preface: The Spirits, archaicly known as the Triplicity, are three subspecies of of a species of sentient colonial single-celled microorganism. They have been worshipped by various races and cultures over time due to the symbiotic relationship they have with the various humanoid species.

Mythology

The Spirits are credited for the creation of the planet, Ïrü (Heru), and for the creation of the various humanoid species of the planet. This mythology has largely been forgotten, however, by the Ћuman populations, and what fragments are truth remain are distorted by cultural adaptations and subjective interpretations.
